description_for_human: Plugin for writing Python code to a specific directory on the local hard drive. If the directory doesn't exist, it will be created. If no directory is specified, a temporary directory with a random number will be created and the new file will be written into that directory.
description_for_model: Plugin for writing Python code to a specific directory on the local hard drive. If the directory doesn't exist, it will be created. If no directory is specified, a temporary directory with a random number will be created and the new file will be written into that directory.
